item.description: The restaurant at Chatham has just now opened. let's go and sample the cape cod cranberry pancakes. KCQX On our way back, we can swing over the Monomy Islands and see if the Great Whites are feeding on the poor innocent cute seals. Then up the coastline towards P-Town to whale watch. Watch your Cape Cod National Seashore flight altitude minimums. Get a bravo clearance and back to FIT. I'm in... Charley
item.why: we can and it could be spectacular.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: lets go to Chatham. Restaurant - Whales - Great Whites!
